attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It defys common logic that landlords have to pay this recently introduced property tax on unoccupied buildings.As you are aware there are property owners reverting to demolition,rather than pay,where next,arson,insurance frauds?.You must relinquish this system forthwith,it is impossible to charge tax on non earnings.If it you ignore us be it at you peril. G Williams

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
